articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Review: Amazon’s 2024 Kindle Paperwhite makes the best e-reader a little better - Ars Technica
articles.description: If you use any Kindle other than the 2021 Paperwhite, this is a huge upgrade.

articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: I, too, installed an open source garage door opener, and am loving it - Ars Technica
articles.description: There’s more than one garage opener with a not-quite-open ecosystem. That’s why an Ars writer installed an OpenGarage unit.
